00036 extern "C" void dgemm_ ( const char *TRANSA, const char *TRANSB,
00037                 const unsigned long *M, const unsigned long *N, const unsigned long *K,
00038                 const double *ALPHA, const double *A, const unsigned long *LDA, const double *B, const unsigned long *LDB,
00039                 const double *BETA, double *C, const unsigned long *LDC)
00040 {
00041         unsigned int i, j, k;
00042 
00043         if (*BETA == 0.0)
00044                 for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00045                         for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00046                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] = 0.0;
00047         else if (*BETA == -1.0)
00048                 for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00049                         for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00050                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] = -C[j+(*LDC)*k];
00051         else if (*BETA != 1.0)
00052                 for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00053                         for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00054                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] *= *BETA;
00055 
00056         if (TRANSA[0] == 'N')
00057                 if (*ALPHA == 1.0)
00058                         for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00059                                 for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00060                                         for (i = 0; i < *K; i++)
00061                                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] += A[j+(*LDA)*i] * B[i+(*LDB)*k];
00062                 else if (*ALPHA == -1.0)
00063                         for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00064                                 for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00065                                         for (i = 0; i < *K; i++)
00066                                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] -= A[j+(*LDA)*i] * B[i+(*LDB)*k];
00067                 else
00068                         for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00069                                 for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00070                                         for (i = 0; i < *K; i++)
00071                                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] += *ALPHA * A[j+(*LDA)*i] * B[i+(*LDB)*k];
00072         else
00073                 if (*ALPHA == 1.0)
00074                         for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00075                                 for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00076                                         for (i = 0; i < *K; i++)
00077                                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] += A[i+(*LDA)*j] * B[i+(*LDB)*k];
00078                 else if (*ALPHA == -1.0)
00079                         for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00080                                 for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00081                                         for (i = 0; i < *K; i++)
00082                                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] -= A[i+(*LDA)*j] * B[i+(*LDB)*k];
00083                 else
00084                         for (k = 0; k < *N; k++)
00085                                 for (j = 0; j < *M; j++)
00086                                         for (i = 0; i < *K; i++)
00087                                                 C[j+(*LDC)*k] += *ALPHA * A[i+(*LDA)*j] * B[i+(*LDB)*k];
00088 }
